      • getPlayer

        public player.Player getPlayer()

      • getNext

        public card.Card getNext​(boolean shouldDraw)
        Returns the next card in the deck by incrementing the current index, doesn't increment it if there are no cards to draw.
        Parameters:
        shouldDraw - A boolean to indicate if the card should be drawn or not.
        Returns:
        the next card in the deck, if it exists other wise null.

      • returnCard

        public void returnCard​(card.Card c)
        Returns the given card to the first empty position of the deck.
        Parameters:
        c - The card that will be returned to the deck.

      • findEntropy

        protected void findEntropy​(int[] places)
        Calculates the shannon entropy of a given array of indices.
        Parameters:
        places - the positions of the baseCards in the deck.

      • fisherYatesShuffle

        protected void fisherYatesShuffle()
        Shuffles the deck with the fisher yates algorithm.

      • doRecursiveFaro

        protected int[] doRecursiveFaro​(int[] positions)
        The interface of the recursive shuffle working method.
        Parameters:
        positions - The positions of the cards in the deck
        Returns:
        An integer of array of the positions of the cards in the deck of the faro shuffle after one run of the faro shuffle algorithm

      • doNoRandomsShuffle

        protected int[] doNoRandomsShuffle​(int[] positions)
        The interface of the no random shuffle method.
        Parameters:
        positions - The positions of the cards in the deck
        Returns:
        An integer of array of the positions of the cards in the deck of the deck after one run of the shuffles.

      • getCards

        public card.Card[] getCards()
        Testing method only. Returns the cards in the deck

      • getBaseCards

        public card.Card[] getBaseCards()
        Accessor method for base cards.
        Returns:
        an array of cards, these are the base cards of the deck.
